segments.text: what are you watching on the telly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: there's a great sitcom on Channel 3 that stars in about three minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: the office . Have you watched it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've seen the British version and loved it , but have never seen the American version .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it's almost exactly the same . I think it's a hilarious show .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: they're just showing highlights of American Idol from last night right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't stand American Idol ! I think it's really over-rated .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I couldn't agree with you more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: have you got satellite , cable , or digital TV ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: we have digital TV . It's amazing though---even with 100 channels , there's often nothing on that I'd want to watch !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you watch a lot of TV then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess so . I'm bit of a couch potato . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't have a TV at home , so I rarely watch anything . Is there anything worth watching after the office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: there's actually a documentary on the history channel later on that I'd like to watch . Do you want to stay and watch it with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: why not ? I don't have anything better to do !
segments.speaker: S1
